Inconsistent Movement Distance in Advanc.bug_description: Noticed while building that when using shift to increase the placement movement and then going immediately back the same number of steps, the object doesn't always end up back in the same place.

BeeHives.bug_description: BeeHives constantly being checked every 5 seconds.
